casebody.data:
Israel Bell v. E. Wilber Pate. Submitted April 4.. Moore <& Moore for the motion.

[See 47 Mich. 463.]

Costs — Stenographer’s fees for copy of testimony,

A stenographer's fees for a copy of Ms notes are not taxaMe as costs.. It is Ms duty to file Ms notes without charge, and he can he compelled to do so; and a payment for such copy is unnecessary.

Motion for retaxation of costs.

Denied April 5.

Ward & Palmer against.
